setting.location: Palace courtyard prepared for spectacle, Aragon, Spain
setting.weather: Clear night with stars, torches providing light

characters.appearance: Thin knight, late 40s, blindfolded, expression of noble determination
characters.action: Gripping wooden horse's neck, leaning forward as if flying

characters.clothing: Fine clothes from duke, disheveled from fear
characters.position: Clinging to knight's back on wooden horse
characters.action: Holding on desperately, mouth open in silent scream

characters.appearance: Duke and courtiers, various ages, struggling not to laugh
characters.action: Operating bellows for wind effect, moving torches for heat

scene.mainElements: Elaborate wooden horse on pivot being manipulated while blindfolded riders believe they're flying, courtiers creating illusion with bellows and torches, cruel entertainment disguised as magical adventure, no text or letters visible
scene.details: Wooden horse painted and decorated to look magical, bellows creating wind effect on riders, servants with torches providing 'sun's heat', cushions below for safety, ropes and pulleys visible, duke's party in shadows watching, wine cups being passed among spectators, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Palace walls decorated with tapestries for event, night sky with stars above
scene.atmosphere: Elaborate practical joke reaching peak cruelty, genuine belief being mocked by cynical entertainment, pathos of knight's noble bearing during humiliation, loyalty of terrified squire, decadent amusement of nobility, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Elevated view showing both riders and manipulating courtiers
composition.focus: Blindfolded pair on wooden horse believing in their flight
composition.depth: Foreground shows operating courtiers, middle ground captures mounted pair, background reveals watching nobles
